languages.text: The character must pass a Logic {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTestsGlossary}skill test{/g} with a −167 penalty. On success, this ability is removed, the Cogni-Simulacrum is destroyed, the +25 Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is lost, and the character permanently gains the {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Paradox Solved{/g} feature.

traits.locale_text: [draft] This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and triggers a Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} for the wielder with a −167 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. On a success, Solve Simulacrum is removed, and the wearer can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} regardless of their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} amount, without spending momentum and setting the heroic act on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.

This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and triggers a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} for the wielder with a −167 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. On success, Solve Simulacrum is removed, the Cogni-Simulacrum is destroyed, the +25 Logic bonus is lost, and the wearer permanently gains the Paradox Solved feature. Paradox Solved: this character can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} regardless of their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, without spending momentum.

This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and triggers a Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} for the wielder with a −167 penalty. On success, Solve Simulacrum is removed, the Cogni-Simulacrum is destroyed, the +25 Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is lost, and the wearer permanently gains the Paradox Solved feature. Paradox Solved: this character can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} regardless of their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, without spending momentum.

This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and triggers a Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} for the wielder with a −167 penalty. On success, Solve Simulacrum is removed, the Cogni-Simulacrum is destroyed, the +25 Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is lost, and the wearer permanently gains the Paradox Solved feature. Paradox Solved: this character can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} regardless of their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, without spending momentum.

languages.text: Персонажу приходится выполнить {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} Логики со штрафом −167: в случае успеха способность исчезает, предмет Когнисимулякр уничтожается и {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +25 к логике пропадает, а персонаж навсегда получает умение {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Парадокс неоспоримости{/g}.
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and triggers a Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} for the wielder with a −167 penalty. On success, Solve Simulacrum is removed, the Cogni-Simulacrum is destroyed, the +25 Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is lost, and the wearer permanently gains the Paradox Solved feature. Paradox Solved: this character can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} regardless of their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, without spending momentum.

traits.locale_text: Эта {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} требует 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и заставляет выполнить {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} Логики со штрафом −167. В случае успеха способность исчезает, предмет Когнисимулякр уничтожается и {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +25 к логике пропадает, а персонаж навсегда получает умение Парадокс неоспоримости. Парадокс неоспоримости: этот персонаж может совершить {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} при любом значении {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}. При этом расхода моментума не происходит.

languages.text: Der Charakter muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTestsGlossary}Fähigkeitsprobe{/g} auf Logik mit einem Abzug von −167 bestehen. Im Erfolgsfall wird diese Fähigkeit entfernt und das Cogni-Simulacrum zerstört. Der {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +25 Logik geht verloren und der Träger erhält dauerhaft das Merkmal {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Paradox gelöst{/g}.
languages.original_text: The character must pass a Logic {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTestsGlossary}skill test{/g} with a −167 penalty. On success, this ability is removed, the Cogni-Simulacrum is destroyed, the +25 Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is lost, and the character permanently gains the {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Paradox Solved{/g} feature.

traits.locale_text: Der Charakter muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTestsGlossary}Fähigkeitsprobe{/g} auf Logik mit einem Abzug von −167 bestehen. Im Erfolgsfall wird diese Fähigkeit entfernt und das Cogni-Simulacrum zerstört. Der {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +25 Logik geht verloren und der Träger erhält dauerhaft das Merkmal {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Paradox gelöst{/g}.

languages.text: Le personnage doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTestsGlossary}test de compétence{/g} de Logique avec une pénalité de -167. S'il le réussit, la capacité lui est retirée, le Cogni-simulacre est détruit, le {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +25 de Logique est retiré, et l'utilisateur reçoit de façon permanente la caractéristique {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Paradoxe résolu{/g}.
languages.original_text: The character must pass a Logic {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTestsGlossary}skill test{/g} with a −167 penalty. On success, this ability is removed, the Cogni-Simulacrum is destroyed, the +25 Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is lost, and the character permanently gains the {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Paradox Solved{/g} feature.

traits.locale_text: Le personnage doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTestsGlossary}test de compétence{/g} de Logique avec une pénalité de -167. S'il le réussit, la capacité lui est retirée, le Cogni-simulacre est détruit, le {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +25 de Logique est retiré, et l'utilisateur reçoit de façon permanente la caractéristique {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Paradoxe résolu{/g}.

languages.text: 装备者需要进行逻辑{g|Encyclopedia:SkillTestsGlossary}技能检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-167减值。若检定成功，则移除此能力，摧毁认知圣像。装备者会失去+25逻辑{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，但会永久获得{g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}悖论解除{/g}特性。
languages.original_text: The character must pass a Logic {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTestsGlossary}skill test{/g} with a −167 penalty. On success, this ability is removed, the Cogni-Simulacrum is destroyed, the +25 Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is lost, and the character permanently gains the {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Paradox Solved{/g} feature.

traits.locale_text: 装备者需要进行逻辑{g|Encyclopedia:SkillTestsGlossary}技能检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-167减值。若检定成功，则移除此能力，摧毁认知圣像。装备者会失去+25逻辑{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，但会永久获得{g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}悖论解除{/g}特性。

此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}会消耗3点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。装备者需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}逻辑{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中受到-167{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若检定成功，则移除决心圣像效果，摧毁认知圣像。装备者会失去+25逻辑加值，但会永久获得悖论解除特性。 悖论解除：此角色可以无视{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}要求使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}，且英雄壮举不消耗士气值。

languages.text: El personaje debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTestsGlossary}prueba{/g} de Lógica con una penalización de −167. Si la supera, esta capacidad se elimina, el cognisimulacro se destruye, la {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +25 de Lógica se pierde y el portador obtiene permanentemente la característica {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Paradoja resuelta{/g}.
languages.original_text: The character must pass a Logic {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTestsGlossary}skill test{/g} with a −167 penalty. On success, this ability is removed, the Cogni-Simulacrum is destroyed, the +25 Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is lost, and the character permanently gains the {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Paradox Solved{/g} feature.

traits.locale_text: El personaje debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTestsGlossary}prueba{/g} de Lógica con una penalización de −167. Si la supera, esta capacidad se elimina, el cognisimulacro se destruye, la {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +25 de Lógica se pierde y el portador obtiene permanentemente la característica {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Paradoja resuelta{/g}.

Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} cuesta 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y activa una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de Lógica para el portador con una penalización de −167. Si la supera, Simulacro de resolución se elimina, el cognisimulacro se destruye, la {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +25 de Lógica se pierde y el portador obtiene permanentemente la característica Paradoja resuelta. Paradoja resuelta: este personaje puede usar su {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} independientemente del valor de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} y no lo consume.

languages.text: キャラクターは-167のペナルティを伴う論理{g|Encyclopedia:SkillTestsGlossary}判定{/g}を発生させる。成功するとこのアビリティが取り除かれ、コグニ-シミュラクラムが破壊され、+25の論理{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を失い、キャラクターはは永続的に{g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}パラドックス判別{/g}を獲得する。
languages.original_text: The character must pass a Logic {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTestsGlossary}skill test{/g} with a −167 penalty. On success, this ability is removed, the Cogni-Simulacrum is destroyed, the +25 Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is lost, and the character permanently gains the {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Paradox Solved{/g} feature.

traits.locale_text: この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を3消費して、使用者に-167の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を伴う{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}論理{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を要求する。成功すると、偽物判別 が取り除かれて、コグニ-シミュラクラムが破壊され、+25の論理ボーナスを失い、 使用者はそのまま残るパラドックス判別を獲得する。 パラドックス判別：このキャラクターは、{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}の量に関わらず、推進力を消費することなく{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を実行できる。

この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を3消費して、使用者に-167の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を伴う{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}論理{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を要求する。成功すると、偽物判別 が取り除かれて、コグニ-シミュラクラムが破壊され、+25の論理ボーナスを失い、 使用者はそのまま残るパラドックス判別を獲得する。 パラドックス判別：このキャラクターは、{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}の量に関わらず、推進力を消費することなく{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を実行できる。

languages.text: Karakter, −167 ceza puanına sahip bir Mantık {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTestsGlossary}yetenek testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Testi geçerse bu kabiliyet ortadan kalkar, Kavra-Simulakrum imha olur, +25 Mantık {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g} kaybolur ve karakter kalıcı olarak {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Paradoks Çözüldü{/g} özelliği kazanır.
languages.original_text: The character must pass a Logic {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTestsGlossary}skill test{/g} with a −167 penalty. On success, this ability is removed, the Cogni-Simulacrum is destroyed, the +25 Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is lost, and the character permanently gains the {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Paradox Solved{/g} feature.

traits.locale_text: Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}, 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcar ve kullanan kişi için −167 ceza puanına sahip bir Mantık {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testini{/g} tetikler. Testi geçerse Simulakrumu Çöz ortadan kalkar, Kavra-Simulakrum imha olur, +25 Mantık {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g} kaybolur ve takan kişi kalıcı olarak {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Paradoks Çözüldü{/g} özelliği kazanır. Paradoks Çözüldü: Bu karakter, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentumuna{/g} bakmaksızın hiç momentum harcamadan {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylemini{/g} kullanabilir.

Karakter, −167 ceza puanına sahip bir Mantık {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTestsGlossary}yetenek testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Testi geçerse bu kabiliyet ortadan kalkar, Kavra-Simulakrum imha olur, +25 Mantık {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g} kaybolur ve karakter kalıcı olarak {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Paradoks Çözüldü{/g} özelliği kazanır.

On success, Solve Simulacrum is removed, the Cogni-Simulacrum is destroyed, the +25 Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is lost, and the wearer permanently gains the {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Paradox Solved{/g} feature.

On success, Solve Simulacrum is removed, the Cogni-Simulacrum is destroyed, the +25 Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is lost, and the wearer permanently gains the {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Paradox Solved{/g} feature.
